data.message: People are getting mad about it being more then just new songs, which I could have sworn that eminem already said a while back that this album will have 1 disc with New tracks which there is and 1 disc with Greatest Hits, which there is...

replies.message: He did lol. People are just dumb
I guess people just find anything to complain about

Greatest hits?  BS.  Disc V is not greatest hits.  It's radio singles that the true hip hop heads don't even like that much.  I can name a couple dozen songs that would go better on Disc V than most of the shit they put on there.
I don't think Eminem(True Hip Hop head) set out to please other artists
Adam please shut you're trap. The GREATEST HITS aren't "radio singles". They're well known HIPHOP songs faggot.
